meaningMnemonic: If you have one <radical>stool</radical> and another <radical>stool</radical>, you have a <kanji>pair</kanji> of stools. Look at this pair of stools. Look at it.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>pair</kanji> of stools shares a <reading>sou</reading>l (そう). Even if you tried to separate them, they'd eventually find their way back together.
